sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Header, Icon, Segment, Grid, Modal, Search, Button, Dimmer, Loader } from 'semantic-ui-react'; import ReactPlayer from 'react-player' const _RegistrationModal = props => { const [open, setOpen] = useState(true); const [defHeight, setHeight] = useState(window.innerWidth); const [YouTube, setYoutube] = useState(); useEffect(() => { const setHeightofScreen = () => setHeight(window.innerHeight) window.addEventListener('resize', setHeightofScreen) return () => { window.removeEventListener('resize', setHeightofScreen) } }) useEffect(() => { }, []) const close = () => { setOpen(false); props.onCloseModal(); } return ( close()}> {props.listOfMovies} {props.movie.overview ?
{props.movie.title || props.movie.name}
{props.movie.overview ? Description {props.movie.overview} : "" } {props.movie.vote_average ? Rating {props.movie.vote_average * 10}%{" "} : "" } {props.movie.number_of_episodes ? Episodes {props.movie.number_of_episodes} : ""} {props.movie.number_of_seasons ? Seasons {props.movie.number_of_seasons} : "" } {props.movie.release_date || props.movie.first_air_date ? Release Date {props.movie.release_date || props.movie.first_air_date} : "" } {props.movie.runtime || props.movie.episode_run_time ? Runtime {props.movie.runtime || props.movie.episode_run_time} : "" }
:
} ) } export default _RegistrationModal;
